# Minecraft 2D Viewer - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Next.js 14 application for visualizing Minecraft region files (.mca) from a top-down perspective.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Client-side processing
- HTML Canvas for rendering
- Prismarine libraries for .mca parsing

## Features
- Upload zipped folder containing .mca files
- Top-down block visualization
- Zoom and pan controls
- Y-level selection
